items.sentence: Tom was so sad that he didn't want to speak to anyone.
Tom found an empty beer can in his daughter's bedroom.
I guess we'll just have to sit tight until help comes.
Tom told Mary he loved her and then hung up the phone.
Tom told me that he didn't want me to do that anymore.
I knew that Tom would want to go to Australia with me.
I don't think Tom will be coming to Australia with me.
Mary is wearing the ugliest dress that I've ever seen.
Do you really think we can do that without Tom's help?
The movie that we watched last night was really scary.
Tom made some peanut butter and jam sandwiches for us.
That's the most important thing I've learned from you.
I never even dreamed that that would be a possibility.
I don't think that I should buy anything else for Tom.
I don't think that I like what Tom is doing right now.
I suspect that Tom knows Mary doesn't want to do that.
I suspect that Tom knows Mary can't understand French.
I suspect Tom knows that Mary doesn't want to do that.
I suspect Tom knows he doesn't really have to do that.
I suspect Tom won't tell Mary why he wants to do that.
